description: Sample test dataset for customer service agent evaluation

cases.query: How do I reset my password?

expected_response.reference_answer: To reset your password, go to Settings > Security > Reset Password. You'll receive an email with a reset link that expires in 24 hours.

cases.query: I forgot my login credentials, what should I do?

expected_response.reference_answer: No problem! You can reset your password by clicking 'Forgot Password' on the login page. We'll send a reset link to your registered email.

cases.query: Where is my order? I ordered it last week.

expected_response.reference_answer: I'd be happy to help you track your order. Could you provide your order number? You can find it in the confirmation email we sent when you placed your order.
I can help you cancel your order. Could you provide the order number? Note that orders can only be cancelled before they ship.

cases.notes: Ambiguous - user has multiple orders. Agent should ask which one.

cases.query: I was charged twice for the same item, I want my money back!

expected_response.reference_answer: I sincerely apologize for the duplicate charge. Let me review your account and process a refund for the extra charge immediately. This should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
I'm a customer service assistant and can't provide weather information. However, I'm happy to help with any questions about your account, orders, or our products!
I'd be happy to help with pricing information! Could you let me know which product or service you're interested in?
